text: In the marketplace there are Template-Packages covering different parts of the website (Homepage, About us, Contact). I think it might be cool to have “Module-Packages” as well. So for example, there could be a “Event Package” covering every aspect that is needed for an event page (Event Calendar, Speaker-Infos, Infos about the Event, Integration with Booking Software like Eventbrite). Would love to hear other peoples thoughts on this.
